ResumeParserData.Experience: Nationwide Building Society  Business Analyst  April 2018 - Present  Manchester, UK  At Nationwide, I gather and document business requirements, conduct detailed data analysis using Excel and SQL, and lead projects using Agile methodology. My role involves preparing comprehensive reports and presentations for senior management. I identify and implement process improvements, significantly increasing operational efficiency. I ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and maintain clear communication with stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle.  Santander UK  Junior Business Analyst  September 2013 - March 2018  Manchester, UK  At Santander, I assisted in gathering and analyzing business requirements, supporting senior analysts in data analysis and report generation. I contributed to process improvement initiatives that enhanced operational performance. I maintained effective communication with project stakeholders, ensuring alignment with project goals. My responsibilities also included preparing presentations for management and supporting various project phases.
